INSERT INTO posts VALUES(2305,211,'Nabuh gamelan kudu ngerti : Pathet lan Wilet 1. Pathet : Jero cetheke swara utawa cendhek-dhuwure swara Lumrahe : Yen wayah sore - pathet 6 Yen wayah bengi - pathet 9
2. Wilet : yaiku sambungane swara ','','')
